metadata.title: CVE-2023-35116 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** jackson-databind through 2.15.2 allows attackers to cause adenial of service or other unspecified impact via a crafted object thatuses cyclic dependencies. NOTE: the vendor's perspective is that this isnot a valid vulnerability report, because the steps of constructing acyclic data structure and trying to serialize it cannot be achieved by anexternal attacker.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
